Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Hillary Clinton never made the statement about "Trump deplorables" at the University of California Berkeley in May 2018.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by attributing the statement to Hillary Clinton when she never made it.
Understate: There is no understatement bias in this claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by presenting a fabricated quote and attributing it to Hillary Clinton.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks support as there is no evidence or record of Hillary Clinton making the statement.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Hillary Clinton made the statement about "Trump deplorables" without any factual basis.
Exist alternative explanation: There is no alternative explanation bias in this claim.
